TYPE BACnetAsyncTransactionToken : STRUCT
A transaction token for BACnet âasynchronous callsâ.
For all âasynchronous callsâ there is a callback in CODESYS runtime component CmpBACnet, which getâs called
asynchronously after the IEC-code has startet the âasynchronous callâ.
This had been chosen as the best solution to avoid the complexitity of handling those callbacks via âIEC-Eventsâ.
The callback in CODESYS runtime component CmpBACnet sets a request status, which can be checked by the IEC-code,
this mechanism is referenced as âcaller status pollingâ later on.
BACnetAsyncTransactionToken is used to identify transactions of âasynchronous callsâ like
BACnetReadProperty
,
and to allow
BACnetCancelPendingConfirmedRequest
if needed.
BACnetAsyncTransactionToken transports a pointer to the request status, to allow âcaller status pollingâ.
The caller had to provide the memory pointed to by this pointer.
